attributes.action: put a stop to modern-day slavery, by working with our government and other governments around the world to make sure there is no one working as a slave anywhere, anymore.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The children of Manor Primary School in Stratford, East London, have mounted a campaign to fight against modern day slavery.  We have started an organisation, The Manor Primary Slavery Breakers and are particularly concerned for the est. 12,000 boys currently working as slaves in cocoa plantations in the Cote D'Ivoire, Africa.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "put a stop to modern-day slavery, by working with our government and other governments around the world to make sure there is no one working as a slave anywhere, anymore."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12019.asp

Prime Minister's Office
